meanings.sent1: The sink was easily drainable after I fixed the clog.
meanings.sent2: The raincoat was not drainable, so it stayed wet for a long time.
meanings.sent3: The drainable sink decided to take a vacation and refused to let any water pass through.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was drainable, like water slowly trickling down a drain.
meanings.sent5: The concept was as clear and drainable as a freshly unclogged pipe.

meanings.definition: Able to be emptied of liquid.
meanings.sent1: The bottle was not drainable, so I had to use a funnel to pour out the liquid.
meanings.sent2: The sponge was very absorbent but not drainable, making it hard to dry.
meanings.sent3: The drainable cup seemed to have a leak, as it kept filling up with liquid.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were drainable, shedding tears like a pitcher pouring out water.
meanings.sent5: The lake was so clear and drainable, you could see the fish swimming at the bottom.

meanings.sent1: The colander was the perfect drainable tool for washing fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The drainable soil in the garden allowed excess water to flow away easily.
meanings.sent3: The drainable road was so steep that even cars had trouble going up.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was drainable, letting go of worries like water running down a drain.
meanings.sent5: The drainable pipe was so efficient that it cleared the water in seconds.
